participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and spirited, Jake enjoys the thrill of speed and the freedom that comes with riding his motorbike. He is a bit of a lone wolf but is always up for a good chat.
participant_1.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. my main transportation is my motorbike. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Lila is a creative soul who enjoys gaming and often feels like an outsider. She has a vivid imagination and often escapes into her virtual worlds.
participant_2.background: i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i do not have many friends. i love to play pobox. i hate school.

content.text: tell me something about yourself, will you?
